title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unlock new business value with Amazon Quick Sight embedded (BIZ227)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过Amazon QuickSight嵌入式解决方案释放新的业务价值 (BIZ227)
abstract: Discover how you can deliver new insights to your application users with Quick Sight. Learn how Moody's Insurance Solutions uses Quick Sight to embed interactive analytics in their Intelligent Risk Platform (IRP) to unlock the power of advanced risk analytics and data-driven decision making. Hear how Quick Sight enables you to add curated analytics experiences like interactive dashboards, paginated reports, and natural language Q&A into any application through low/no-code workflows. See how you can deliver these advanced analytic capabilities to 100's of 1000s of users while maintaining security and access controls.
abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 QuickSight 为您的应用程序用户提供新的洞察。了解穆迪保险解决方案如何使用 QuickSight 在其智能风险平台 (IRP) 中嵌入交互式分析，以释放高级风险分析和数据驱动决策的力量。了解 QuickSight 如何通过低代码/无代码工作流程，让您能够在任何应用程序中添加精选的分析体验，如交互式仪表板、分页报告和自然语言问答。了解如何在维护安全性和访问控制的同时，为数十万用户提供这些高级分析功能。

presenter.name: Jose Banos Sanchez
presenter.title: Sr. WW GTM Specialist Amazon Quick Suite
